event.title: Fellowship Meeting in Berlin, Germany
event.body: The local Fellowship Group will meet on 12 February, 19:30 at NewThinkingStore, Tucholskystraße 48. Jürgen Neumann from Freifunk-Berlin will talk about "Open Hardware". Afterwards there will be room for questions and a discussion. People interested in this topic and other guest are as always welcome to join us.
